title: Credo ecclesiam sanctam Catholicam I beleeue the holy Catholike Church : the authoritie, vniuersalitie, and visibilitie of the church handled and discussed / by Edward Chaloner ...
author: Chaloner, Edward, 1590 or 91-1625.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I.L. for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out Lumbard-streete,
